definitions.definition: Any plant of the genus Helianthus , so called probably from the form and color of its floral head , having the form of a large disk surrounded by yellow ray flowers.

subdefinitions.definition: The commonly cultivated species, Helianthus annuus , a native of America.

definitions.definition: A bright yellow , like that of the flower petals.
Any flat, radially symmetric organic compound , such as coronene .

An Automatic Warning System (AWS) indicator in the driver 's cab that is displayed after a driver has acknowledged an audible warning , which consists of a yellow circle enclosing a white circle, with black spokes overlaid.

main_definition: Any plant of the genus Helianthus , so called probably from the form and color of its floral head , having the form of a large disk surrounded by yellow ray flowers.
secondary_definitions: A bright yellow , like that of the flower petals.
( informal , organic chemistry ) Any flat, radially symmetric organic compound , such as coronene .

( UK , rail transport ) An Automatic Warning System (AWS) indicator in the driver 's cab that is displayed after a driver has acknowledged an audible warning , which consists of a yellow circle enclosing a white circle, with black spokes overlaid.
